Name: Inglorious Pirate
About the game: The treasures of the old wolf are stolen, and he will not leave this unpunished. Inglorious pirate is a 2D platformer with side-view shooter elements. The player will play the role of an old pirate, from whom a treasure treasure was stolen. Your task is to overcome all obstacles, traps, as well as pirate bullets fired by your enemies. At the disposal of the old wolf there are 3 types of weapons, as well as agility and ingenuity. Features: -Pixel Graphics -Attractive gameplay -Unforgettable music
